scripts.pre-run: npm run build && npm run copy-resources && mkdir -p dist && NODE_PATH=dist/ node ./dist/index.js
scripts.debug: source envs/debug.env && npm run clean && npm run pre-run && node .
scripts.post-debug: tmux kill-session -t marcos-22nd-debug && tmux new-session -s marcos-22nd-debug -d npm run debug
scripts.deploy-debug: source envs/debug.env && npm run pre-deploy && ssh -t root@$PROD_IP 'cd marcos-22nd-web ; npm run post-debug'
scripts.post-deploy: tmux kill-session -t marcos-22nd && tmux new-session -s marcos-22nd -d npm start
scripts.deploy: source envs/prod.env && npm run pre-deploy && ssh -t root@$PROD_IP 'cd marcos-22nd-web ; npm run post-deploy'
scripts.start: source envs/prod.env && npm run clean && npm run pre-run && node .
